name: Legend of Heroen (English Version)
description:
A long time Ago, Kartandor planed to attack the tower of Karulord and kill him once and for all and being the most powerful being in the world to make a wave of darkness in all the lands, but Karulord stoped him with the lose of his only son, Jingo.

The time passed, and a evil witch plans to resurrect Kartandor and his evil plans.

Guide Herion and his friends in the search of the forgotten mystic runes from the legends to stop the evil plans of Kartandor...

Herion: The grandson of Aesierth, he was raised with no parents in the small island of Londif.

Aesierth: Grandfather of Herion, is a oldman with some misteries about his origins, and has something to do with the people of Fargote.

Bilnia: Bilnia lives with Oentil since his mother died and his father left him alone with Oentil because of the wars.

Katana: Is the royal general of the Trons armies, is loyal to his King, and will provide great help in the future.

Edilgarath: He will help Herion on his adventure to research the origins and a strange creature.

Harbrok: Is the Captain of the Arquedia, but something is wrong in his decisions...

Goro: The twin brother of Brownbeard, he hates Ibeli, and will do anything to kill her in the most horrible deaths.

Kuruk: After his village was desolated by Eskalatus, he joins with Herion and will guide him around the Heroen's continent

Kasandra: Kasandra was lost in the evil swamps of Grescal, and will provide some help searching the mystic runes

Katy: Katy the corsair, always lived in the seas with his father, but she was captured and used as a hostage to destroy the Arquedia.

Nohar: A misterous Heroen that knows something about the origins of Herion and his parents.

Ibeli: The evil witch, her plans are to resurrect Kartandor, a demon evil and will consume the life of the people to resurrect Kartandor.

Eskalatus: An evil skeleton look-a-like, he will comand the evil armies to stop Herion.

Kartandor: The demon evil, the most powerful of them, his plans are still unkown

Playtime: 20-30 hours

Engines and features:
Custom learning skills menu
Custom World map
Custom initial menu
SFX look-a-like Snes ones
Custom battle systems in important battles.
MeD engine, consists on objects like in Zelda and Lufia 2Series, to solve puzles, fireballs, iceballs, bombs, claws, revealer and a ocarina
